edu.gmu.team1.idt2014

Class GMUT

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • edu.gmu.team1.idt2014.GMUT
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class GMUT
extends java.lang.Thread
    GMUT is the primary access point to the testing API.
    It is a thread-safe singleton class that is instantiated when the api is first called.

    Key access to GMUT is through two methods.
    • addTest()
    • test(Object, int, Object...)

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Thread

        java.lang.Thread.State, java.lang.Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler

      • Fields inherited from class java.lang.Thread

        MAX_PRIORITY, MIN_PRIORITY, NORM_PRIORITY

        public static ITestBuilder addTest()
        This method returns an ITestBuilder which creates a test structure.
        Returns:
        ITestBuilder
        See Also:
        ITestBuilder

      • test

        public static void test(java.lang.Object output,
        int branch,
        java.lang.Object... inputs)
        This method performs the actual testing. It evaluates a given method for its input predicate. Then, if the input predicate returns true, it evaluates the output predicate for testing whether or not the test passed or failed.
        Parameters:
        output - The output of the method tested.
        branch - The branch of the return statement
        inputs - The sequence of inputs passed into the function.

      • buildTest

        public static void buildTest(java.lang.String tName,
             TestStructure tStructure)
        This method builds and actual test-case for a given class+method and testStructure. Ideally this is not accessed as TestBuilder builds these test for you.
        Parameters:
        tName - Test name.
        tStructure - Test structure.

      • getReportWriter

        public static AbstractReportWriter getReportWriter()
        This returns the current IReportWriter that GMUT is using.
        Returns:
        the report writer that GMUT is currently using.

      • setReportWriter

        public static void setReportWriter(AbstractReportWriter _report)
        This sets the current IReportWriter that GMUT is using.
        Parameters:
        _report - The new reportwriter that GMUT will use.
